title: Dallas Seymour
text:
Dallas Seymour (born 19 August 1967 in <a href="Tokoroa">Tokoroa</a>) is a former <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer and <a href="rugby%20sevens">rugby sevens</a> player. One of New Zealand rugby sevens longest serving players he played in the national team from 1988 until 2002. He made a brief appearance as an <a href="All%20Black">All Black</a>, playing 3 tour matches in Australia in 1992.
He is married to former <a href="Silver%20Fern">Silver Fern</a> captain <a href="Julie%20Seymour">Julie Seymour</a>.
